scripts.date:load: export DATE_HASH=$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S) && process.env['DATE_HASH'] = ${DATE_HASH}; sudo bash -c 'echo "DATE_HASH=${DATE_HASH}" >> /etc/environment' && echo "DATE_HASH SET: ${DATE_HASH}" && sed -i -e "s/DATE_HASH=.*/DATE_HASH=$DATE_HASH/" .env
scripts.prepare: npm run date:load && bash -c 'source .env && echo PREPARE DATE_HASH: $DATE_HASH'
scripts.replace:html: bash -c 'source .env && echo REPLACE GET DATE_HASH: $DATE_HASH && sed -i "s/\(css\/.*\|js\/.*\)\.[^.]*\(\.css\|\.js\)/\1.$DATE_HASH\2/g" dist/*.html dist/tests/*.html'
scripts.build-css:main: bash -c 'source .env && echo BUILD-CSS GET DATE_HASH: $DATE_HASH && npx @tailwindcss/cli -i ./src/styles/main.css -o ./dist/css/main.${DATE_HASH}.css'
scripts.build-css:tests: bash -c 'source .env && echo BUILD-CSS-TESTS GET DATE_HASH: $DATE_HASH && npx @tailwindcss/cli -i ./src/styles/tests.css -o ./dist/css/tests.${DATE_HASH}.css'
scripts.build: run-s prebuild build:files && run-p build:js build:css
scripts.prebuild: run-s clean copy:env prepare lint:fix format
scripts.check: npm run format:check && npm run lint
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run replace:reset
scripts.serve: bash -c 'source .devcontainer/.env && echo SERVER Run in Localhost PORT:${PORT} && npx http-server ./dist -o -p ${PORT}'
